How does it work?

Build your catalogue

List your services catalogue and working hours on Bapp

Integrate your CTAs

Integrate your booking url with your digital channels and ads

Get bookings

View, accept and manage bookings on Bapp Partner website and app

Your data privacy is our responsibility

We believe that trust is paramount in a relationship. We do not own or sell your data, and we most certainly do not bank on advertising-based business models. The only way we make money is from the software license fees you pay us.

Why Bapp?

Improve Marketing ROI

Convert every social media post or stories into actual bookings. No more form filling, calling, messaging etc

Search to instant booking

Promote bapp booking url on your paid search campaigns to get instant bookings.

Booking Management

Manage appointments & walk-ins with our user friendly Bapp partner website or mobile app.

Reports and Insights

Get live performance reports for your business, staff, services etc.

Showcase your catalogue

Showcase your products and services on multiple platforms. No technical knowledge is required

QR Code menu

Showcase your products and services on multiple platforms. No technical knowledge is required.
